special-semanticschemas: The name of the special page
semanticschemas-overview: Navigation tab label for overview section
semanticschemas-export: Navigation tab label for export section
semanticschemas-import: Navigation tab label for import section
semanticschemas-validate: Navigation tab label for validate section
semanticschemas-generate: Navigation tab label for generate section
semanticschemas-diff: Navigation tab label for diff section
semanticschemas-tab-overview-subtext: Short description shown under the Overview tab label
semanticschemas-tab-export-subtext: Short description shown under the Export tab label
semanticschemas-tab-import-subtext: Short description shown under the Import tab label
semanticschemas-tab-validate-subtext: Short description shown under the Validate tab label
semanticschemas-tab-generate-subtext: Short description shown under the Generate tab label
semanticschemas-tab-diff-subtext: Short description shown under the Diff tab label
semanticschemas-overview-summary: Summary text for the overview page
semanticschemas-overview-hero-descriptio: Hero section subheading describing the overview
semanticschemas-overview-categories-subt: Subtitle for the category coverage card
semanticschemas-overview-no-categories: Empty-state message when no categories exist
semanticschemas-label-categories: Short label used for category metric cards
semanticschemas-label-properties: Short label used for property metric cards
semanticschemas-label-subobjects: Short label used for subobject metric cards
semanticschemas-label-last-change: Label for timestamp of last structural change
semanticschemas-label-last-generation: Label for timestamp of last successful generation
semanticschemas-label-schema-hash: Label for stored source schema hash (trimmed)
semanticschemas-label-not-available: Fallback label when no data is present
semanticschemas-badge-available: Badge text when an item exists/is healthy
semanticschemas-badge-missing: Badge text when an item is missing
semanticschemas-badge-review: Badge text when attention is required
semanticschemas-badge-clean: Badge text when no manual edits are detected
semanticschemas-export-schema-preview: Header text for schema preview section
semanticschemas-export-copy: Button text to copy schema to clipboard
semanticschemas-import-created:
Number of items created. Parameters:
* $1 - count
semanticschemas-import-updated:
Number of items updated. Parameters:
* $1 - count
semanticschemas-import-unchanged:
Number of items unchanged. Parameters:
* $1 - count
semanticschemas-import-posthint-generate: Message shown after successful import suggesting next steps
semanticschemas-import-inprogress: Progress message shown during schema import
semanticschemas-import-no-schema: Error message when no schema is provided
semanticschemas-import-error:
Error message for import failure. Parameters:
* $1 - error message
semanticschemas-ratelimit-exceeded:
Error message when rate limit is exceeded. Parameters:
* $1 - maximum operations per hour
semanticschemas-generate-tip: Short helper text encouraging validation before generation
semanticschemas-generate-all: Option to generate for all categories
semanticschemas-generate-success:
Success message after generation. Parameters:
* $1 - number of categories successfully processed
* $2 - total number of categories
semanticschemas-generate-inprogress: Progress message shown during artifact generation
semanticschemas-generate-processing:
Progress message for individual category. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
semanticschemas-generate-no-categories: Error message when no categories match the filter
semanticschemas-generate-error:
Error message for generation failure. Parameters:
* $1 - error message
semanticschemas-generate-category-error:
Error message when generation fails for a specific category. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
* $2 - error message
semanticschemas-diff-apply: Button text to apply changes from diff
semanticschemas-error-no-smw: Error message when SemanticMediaWiki is not installed
semanticschemas-error-no-pageforms: Error message when PageForms is not installed
semanticschemas-error-circular-dependenc:
Error message for circular dependency. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
semanticschemas-error-missing-category:
Error message for missing category. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
semanticschemas-error-missing-property:
Error message for missing property. Parameters:
* $1 - property name
semanticschemas-permission-denied: Error message when user lacks permissions
semanticschemas-log-name: Name for the SemanticSchemas log shown in Special:Log
semanticschemas-log-header: Description header for the SemanticSchemas log
semanticschemas-hierarchy-tree-title: Heading for the hierarchy tree section
semanticschemas-hierarchy-props-title: Heading for the inherited properties section
semanticschemas-hierarchy-subobjects-tit: Heading for the inherited subobject section
semanticschemas-hierarchy-no-data: Message when no hierarchy data is available
semanticschemas-hierarchy-no-properties: Message when a category has no inherited properties
semanticschemas-hierarchy-no-subobjects: Message when a category has no subobject definitions
semanticschemas-hierarchy-loading: Loading message while hierarchy data is fetched
semanticschemas-hierarchy-error: Generic error message for hierarchy failures
semanticschemas-hierarchy-no-category: Error message when no category is provided
semanticschemas-hierarchy-source-categor: Column label for source category name
semanticschemas-hierarchy-required-state: Column label describing whether a subobject is required
semanticschemas-hierarchy-unknown-catego: Fallback text when the source category is missing
semanticschemas-hierarchy-unnamed-proper: Fallback text when property name is missing
semanticschemas-action-generate-form: Text shown in the action dropdown menu on Category pages to generate a form
semanticschemas-form-generated:
Success message after generating a form. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
semanticschemas-generate-form-failed:
Error message when form generation fails. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
* $2 - error message
semanticschemas-generate-form-no-categor: Error message when no category is specified for form generation
semanticschemas-generate-form-no-schema:
Error message when the category has no schema data. Parameters:
* $1 - category name
createsemanticpage: The name of the CreateSemanticPage special page, displayed in the page heading
semanticschemas-createpage-title: Title for the Create Semantic Page special page
semanticschemas-createpage-tree-title: Heading for the category selection tree panel
semanticschemas-createpage-preview-title: Heading for the property preview panel
semanticschemas-createpage-empty-state: Instructional text shown when no categories are selected
semanticschemas-createpage-loading: Loading indicator text while fetching properties
semanticschemas-createpage-error: Error message when API call fails. $1 is the error detail
semanticschemas-createpage-shared-sectio: Section heading for properties shared across multiple categories
semanticschemas-createpage-remove-catego: Aria label for the remove button on category chips
semanticschemas-createpage-namespace-con: Message shown when selected categories have conflicting target namespaces
semanticschemas-createpage-namespace-lab: Label for namespace radio option. $1 is namespace name, $2 is comma-separated category names
semanticschemas-createpage-pagename-labe: Label for the page name input field
semanticschemas-createpage-pagename-plac: Placeholder text for page name input
semanticschemas-createpage-page-exists-w: Warning shown when the entered page name already exists
semanticschemas-createpage-submitting: Text on submit button while form is being submitted
semanticschemas-createpage-submit-error: Error message when form submission fails. $1 is the error detail
semanticschemas-createpage-no-categories: Validation message when no categories selected
semanticschemas-createpage-no-pagename: Validation message when page name is empty
